definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
To enjoy blessings and endure misfortune together (idiom); for better or for worse
pinyin: you3 fu2 tong2 xiang3 , you3 huo4 tong2 dang1

definition: To enjoy blessings and endure misfortune together (idiom); for better or for worse
pinyin: you3 fu2 tong2 xiang3 , you3 nan4 tong2 dang1

sentences.chinese: 這真是一項有福的運動。

sentences.english: Handmade Christmas ornaments made for the fans of Angry Birds.
sentences.chinese: 手工製成的聖誕樹小掛件，小鳥迷們有福啦。

sentences.english: But now we call the arrogant blessed.
sentences.chinese: 如今我們稱狂傲的人爲有福。

sentences.english: Blessed is he that expects nothing , for he shall never be disappointed.
sentences.chinese: 無奢望者有福，因其永遠不會失望。

sentences.english: Blessed is the man whose strength is in thee; in whose heart are the ways of them.
sentences.chinese: 靠你有力量心中想往錫安大道的，這人便爲有福。
那沒有看見就信的，有福了。

sentences.english: Through the blending in the Body of Christ, God makes us so fruitful and blessed.
sentences.chinese: 通過在基督身體裏的相調，神使我們多產而有福。

sentences.english: It's better to give than receive.
Blessed are the undefiled in the way, who walk in the law of the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 行爲完全，遵行耶和華律法的，這人便爲有福。

sentences.english: Miracles are teaching devices for demonstrating that it is more blessed to give than to receive.
sentences.chinese: 奇蹟是種教學手段，證明‘施比受更有福’。

sentences.english: Blessed is the man that feareth the LORD, that delighteth greatly in his commandments.
sentences.chinese: 敬畏耶和華，甚喜愛他命令的，這人便爲有福。

sentences.english: And now, my children, listen to me: happy are those who keep my ways.
sentences.chinese: 衆子啊，現在要聽從我，因爲謹守我道的，便爲有福。

sentences.english: Giving is more blessed than receiving.
sentences.chinese: 能施與的人，比受施的人更有福。

sentences.english: Blessed are they that keep judgment, and he that doeth righteousness at all times.
sentences.chinese: 凡遵守公平，常行公義的，這人便爲有福。

definition: to live comfortably/happy and prosperous life
facial expression of good fortune/joyous and contented look
to accumulate merit/to do good/to give to charity/virtuous actions
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
